table.name: civicrm_entity_financial_item
table.comment: Map between an entity and a batch, where there is a specific relationship between the financial batch and the entity

field.name: entity_table
field.comment: The table that contains the header information for this batch of financial_items - primarily this will just be civicrm_contribution, but in future it could be civicrm_financial_batch for a generic batch such as a quickbooks export, civicrm_order for the "printed order", civicrm_invoice for the "printed invoice", civicrm_official_receipt for the "printed receipt"

field.name: entity_id
field.comment: Links to an id in the entity_table, such as id in civicrm_batch
